title: The real reason TFT is more “competitive” than SR
body:
riot recently published the thing about TFT being much more competitive than summoners rift. They are using the “competitiveness” excuse to expand the TFT game into a pro scene and whatever. You know why everyone plays ranked TFT over normal TFT? There is no downside to it other than party restrictions.

In TFT, you aren’t teamed with **trolls, inters, griefers, toxic teammates, racist teammates, afks, and the matchmaking is semi-competent.**

In SR, all those things have a much higher likelihood of appearing in ranked. Maybe if all that was fixed, SR would be as, if not more, competitive.
